segments.text: Sorry to bother you so early . There's another couple who wants to rent the apartment , but I thought I'd ask you first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's so sweet of you . We definitely want it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought so , by the looks on your faces when you left . So why don't you come to my apartment , and we'll settle all the details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How does seven o'clock this evening sound ?
segments.speaker: S2
